components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Sender ID

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are continuing to investigate the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Sender ID. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 16 hours or sooner.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delay to Tigo Network in Paraguay

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Tigo Network in Paraguay. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Tigo Network in Paraguay. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 13 May 2025 at 18:00 PDT until 14 May 2025 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 07 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 29 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

07 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 08 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
14 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 16 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
21 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 22 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
28 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 29 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
